theorem ex7 (x : Nat) : (let y := x + 0; y + y) = x + x := by
  simp
@[simp] theorem impTrue (p : Sort u) : (p → True) = True :=
  propext <| Iff.intro (fun _ => trivial) (fun _ _ => trivial)
theorem ex8 (y x : Nat) : y = 0 → x + y = 0 → x = 0 := by
  simp (config := { contextual := true }
